fields.headline: Annotated solutions for Genius 208
fields.bodyText: A single letter must be added to each solution, making another word or phrase (as enumerated). These letters include the whole alphabet at least once, but with three A’s and two E’s, F’s, N’s and T’s. The clues are in alphabetical order of the inserted letters. 1 cuteness +A CU  ER = DRUBBER 7 laterite +E LATE/RITE = ELATERITE [bitumen] 8 vocation +E V(a/O)CATION = EVOCATION [A(ssociate)/O(fficious)] 9 rail +F LIAR (rev) = FRAIL 10 rile +F (moo)R/I  E = RIFLE 11 Este +G ST(reet) in E(migr)E = GESTE [House of Este; exploit or bearing] 12 delis +H S  LED (rev) = DELISH (informal) 13 dent +I transcenDENTalist (hidden) = IDENT (abbr) 14 debels +J DEB  S = DJEBELS [overcomes in combat; range of hills] 15 sewer +K S(wimmer)/EWER = SKEWER 16 eases +L (t)EASES = EASELS 17 raping +M RA  G = RAMPING 18 metal age +N MET/A/LAGE(r) = MENTAL AGE [archaeological period (OED)] 19 U-bend +N U(p/B)END = UNBEND [B(ishop/P(awn)] 20 quit +O QUI(French)/T(emperature) = QUOIT 21 latitude +P L(os)A(ngeles)/TIT/DUE(anag) = PLATITUDE 22 roué +Q ROU(t)E = ROQUE 23 squiring +R QU(een) in RISING (anag) = SQUIRRING [skimming] 24 ledger +S L(o/E)DGER [O(ld)/E(uropean)] = SLEDGER 25 apple +T A  LE = APPLET 26 raveller +T RAVEL + (a)L(l)E(g)R(o) = TRAVELLER 27 crated +U C(ar/RA)TED = CURATED 28 loured +V LOU  D = LOUVRED [Royal Engineers] 29 teeter +W guaranTEE TERminated = TWEETER 30 eons +X (dung)EONS =EXONS 31 lase +Y LA(p)SE = LYASE [cut with a laser beam; an enzyme] 32 Xiang +Z XI(eleven)/A(pply)/N(avigating)/G(eographically) = XIZANG [Chinese river; Tibet]
